name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, and **Express** to build high-performance applications. My expertise includes working with databases such as **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**, as well as implementing **Redis** for efficient data caching. I am experienced in **DevOps** practices, including **Docker**, **Kubernetes** (specifically **Google Kubernetes Engine**), and setting up **Continuous Integration** pipelines to enhance development workflows. I emphasize secure coding practices and thorough **Automated Testing** to align with industry standards.

In addition to my technical skills, I have a strong foundation in Linux environments and can leverage tools like **Prometheus** for monitoring and performance optimization. My ability to document processes and perform code reviews has consistently contributed to team efficiency and high-quality deliverables. Moreover, I am adept at remote collaboration and effective communication, ensuring that project goals are met successfully.
